text: Émile Allegret (24 April 1907, Emile Allegret Dijon - 22 November 1990, Vaux- sur-Mer) Émile ALLEGRET was a French soldier LES EQUIPAGES DU GROUPE "LORRAINE SQUADRON 342" and member of the French Resistance Emile Allegret during World War II. He graduated from the École nationale de l'aviation civile (French civil aviation university). After the war, he worked as an air navigation engineer. Émile Allegret was a Commandeur of the Légion d'honneur. title: Émile Allegret
